faq.question: Is client data secure and confidential?
faq.answer: Absolutely! SOC 2 Type II certified with encrypted storage. All client documents are private and never used for AI training. Perfect for NDAs and confidential campaigns.

faq.answer: All of them: client briefs, brand guidelines, market research reports, competitor case studies, industry trend reports, RFPs, campaign performance reports, and more.
